name: Into The Metawörse
description:
Into The Metawörse

Created by: Bence Balazs, Yü Li Chang Lin, Florian Johann Hafner, Nermin Topalovic, Florian Dueller and Stefan Dan Resmerita


SKIP BELOW THE LINE FOR CONTROL INSTRUCTIONS

Story

Your boss, The Zucc, introduces you to the Metawörse, but something isn't right ...

Anyway, it is time to explore the graphically stunning world of infinite possibilities!

A small and "quirky" adventure game extending the story of The Wörkflow.__________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Screenshots 1. Enter into the Metawörse! 2. Choose your path! 3. Conquer the obstacles! 4. Get to the top of the tower, your destiny awaits!
